channel.title: Cache Editing
channel.description:
I am looking into a blank client's cache and I'm interested in editing it's cache without using Tom's Cache editor. I would like to edit it manually. So here's what i'm working with:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34ya4w1.png[/img]
I would specifically just like to open "main_file_cache.DAT". Does any one have any idea as to what program I can use to open/view/edit it?

item.title: Cache Editing
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

One cannot simply right click > edit a cache. Toms cache editor was designed for a reason. Unless you have the ability to create your own cache editor, which is admittedly not impossible but with you asking this question I doubt you have the knowledge, you cannot edit the cache without a cache editor of sorts

Read full topic
